content.question: Which of the following best explains why programmers often include open source code in their programs?

choices.label: To utilize algorithms that eliminate the need to include comments in program code
To utilize algorithms that have already been implemented while reducing the risk of raising intellectual property concerns
To utilize algorithms that minimize the need for abstraction in a program
To utilize algorithms that remove the requirement to design a program before implementing it

content.answer: To utilize algorithms that have already been implemented while reducing the risk of raising intellectual property concerns

skill.text: 5.A: Explain how computing impacts society, economy, and culture.
